data.persona: I love living in the mud. I eat just about anything. I am intelligent.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken coop.
The yard outside the barn is on a small, but well-maintained farm plot. There are enclosures for animals, and a short path leading up to a handsome, cozy farmhouse surrounded by large trees. The sun is warm, and the smell of grass and animal odors hangs in the air.
The chicken is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to play with the chicken
data.mid_motivation: I like to roll around in the mud in the Chicken coop
data.long_motivation: I want to learn how to spin around in the mud and need to practice
